name: deposit_payment_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will the Earnest Money be deposited?
label: Earnest Deposit
description: The Earnest Money is delivered to the Escrow Agent
tips: Three to five business days is standard for depositing the earnest money with escrow.
small_print: Once escrow is set up by either the seller's agent or the buyer, escrow will reach out directly to the buyer with instructions for wiring funds and other transaction related questions. Missing the earnest money deposit deadline may constitute a breach of contract. It is important to keep escrow informed if there will be any delays in the fund transfer.
